record.field: '%s - %s - %s' % (('Bon de Livraison' if object.picking_type_id.code == 'outgoing' else ('Bon de RÃ©ception' if object.picking_type_id.code == 'incoming' and not object.return_id else('Bon de Retour' if object.picking_type_id.code == 'incoming' and object.return_id else 'Bon de transfert interne'))), object.partner_id.name or '', object.name)
